birth_place.zh-cn: 东京都千代田区皇居产殿

description.zh-cn: 日本皇室成员，昭和天皇与香淳皇后的次子，上皇明仁的弟弟。毕业于学习院大学，主修化学，后于东京大学研究生院专攻动物学。以从事癌症病因研究而闻名。
description.en: A member of the Imperial House of Japan, the second son of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the younger brother of Emperor Akihito. He graduated from Gakushuin University with a degree in chemistry and later specialized in zoology at the University of Tokyo's graduate school. He is known for his research on the causes of cancer.

description.zh-cn: 日本第124代天皇，常陸宮正仁亲王的父亲。
description.en: The 124th Emperor of Japan, father of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇的皇后，常陸宮正仁亲王的母亲。
description.en: The empress consort of Emperor Shōwa and mother of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁亲王的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 正仁親王妃华子的父亲。
description.en: The father of Hanako, Princess Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的长子，常陸宮正仁亲王的哥哥。
description.en: The elder son of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the elder brother of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的长女，常陸宮正仁亲王的姐姐。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the elder sister of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的次女，常陸宮正仁亲王的姐姐。
description.en: The second daughter of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the elder sister of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的三女，常陸宮正仁亲王的姐姐。
description.en: The third daughter of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the elder sister of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的四女，常陸宮正仁亲王的姐姐。
description.en: The fourth daughter of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the elder sister of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 昭和天皇与香淳皇后的五女，常陸宮正仁亲王的妹妹。
description.en: The fifth daughter of Emperor Shōwa and Empress Kōjun, and the younger sister of Masahito, Prince Hitachi.

description.zh-cn: 包括天皇及皇族，是日本的国家元首家族。
description.en: Comprises the Emperor and the Imperial Family, the head of state family of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京都千代田区，是日本天皇的住所。
description.en: Located in Chiyoda, Tokyo, it is the primary residence of the Emperor of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的一所著名私立大学。
description.en: A prestigious private university in Tokyo, Japan.

description.zh-cn: 位于日本东京的一所世界级顶尖研究型国立综合大学。
description.en: A world-class top research-oriented national comprehensive university located in Tokyo, Japan.

description.zh-cn: 日本皇室的宫家之一，由正仁亲王于1964年创立。
description.en: One of the princely houses of the Japanese Imperial Family, founded by Prince Masahito in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 日本一家专注于癌症研究的公益财团法人。
description.en: A public interest incorporated foundation in Japan focused on cancer research.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国首都华盛顿特区的一所私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Washington, D.C., United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国明尼苏达州的一所公立研究型大学系统。
description.en: A public research university system in the U.S. state of Minnesota.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是上皇明仁的弟弟。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the younger brother of Akihito.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是东久迩成子的弟弟。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the younger brother of Shigeko Higashikuni.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是久宫祐子内亲王的弟弟。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the younger brother of Princess Hisa.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是鹰司和子的弟弟。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the younger brother of Kazuko Takatsukasa.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是池田厚子的弟弟。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the younger brother of Atsuko Ikeda.

description.zh-cn: 常陸宮正仁親王是岛津贵子的哥哥。
description.en: Masahito, Prince Hitachi is the elder brother of Takako Shimazu.

position.zh-cn: 大学院理学研究科研究生

description.zh-cn: 于东京大学大学院理学研究科成为研究生，专攻动物学。
description.en: Became a postgraduate researcher in the Graduate School of Science at the University of Tokyo, specializing in zoology.

description.zh-cn: 作为皇子，是日本皇室成员。
description.en: As a prince, he is a member of the Imperial House of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 与津轻华子结婚，创设常陆宫。
description.en: Established the Hitachi-no-miya upon his marriage to Hanako Tsugaru.

description.zh-cn: 授予常陸宮正仁親王名誉博士学位，以表彰其对癌症研究的贡献。
description.en: Awarded an honorary doctorate to Prince Masahito of Hitachi in recognition of his contributions to cancer research.

description.zh-cn: 授予常陸宮正仁親王名誉博士学位。
description.en: Awarded an honorary doctorate to Prince Masahito of Hitachi.
